description:
This table contains descriptive occupation history for patients recorded for a given encounter.  Each row represents one line of text for occupation description and/or occupation comments for a single employer.


If more than one occupation is commented on or described, each related line of descriptions/comments will have the employer ID field in that line populated with that occupation's employer ID.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: The unique system identifier of the patient encounter. Contact serial number is unique across all patients and all contacts.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_DATE_REAL
columns.description: This is a numeric representation of the date of this encounter in your system. The integer portion of the number specifies the date of the encounter. The digits after the decimal point indicate multiple visits on one day.

columns.name: HX_EMPLOYER_ID
columns.description: The unique system identifier of the patient's employer.

columns.name: HX_OCCUPN_COMMENT
columns.description: Any comments listed regarding the patient's occupation.

columns.name: HISTORY_SOURCE_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the source of entry for this row of data (i.e. where this data came from). Some examples include:  Provider Patient Parent


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Provider


Patient


Parent


Legal Guardian


Proxy User
